An atomic effect can be a damage: when the player gets one damage.

discoverServer(int) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
This method sends UDP broadcast messages to the discoveryPort until the server is found.
DOOR - it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.rooms.Connection
If between two adjacent squares there is not a wall (so it is possible to move/shoot from one to the other) but they are in different rooms.
drawBoard(JsonObject, String) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.console.terminal.BoardDrawer
For each square this method combines walls and all the information contained in the jsonObject given as a parameter to build dynamically the array of strings with players, ammo cubes and the id of the cards.
dropsMap - Static variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.animations.Images
A map that holds the Image for every damage drop.
DuplicateException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.exceptions.properties
It is thrown when there are too many targets in the target list, so the effect cannot be executed.
